channel.title: Chưa phân loại – NguyenLuan++
channel.description: Chúc mừng bạn đã được thêm tên vào DeaThnOte

item.title: Water Bottle in Mint
item.dc:creator: nguyenluan
item.description:
Product Specs:
9.3″ x 2.75″ x 2.75″
Borosilicate Glass and Silicone A reusable water bottle for your everyday life. It’s light and made to last with quality glass and matte silicone. Plus, it’s dishwasher safe! Perfect for cool beverages.
  • Dishwasher safe
  • BPA Free, Cal Prop 65 Compliant
  • FDA / LFGB Approved
  • Cold Liquids Only
  photo credit: @wandpdesign
item.content:encoded:
Embodying the raw, wayward spirit of rock ‘n’ roll, the Kilburn portable active stereo speaker takes the unmistakable look and sound of Marshall, unplugs the chords, and takes the show on the road.

Weighing in under 7 pounds, the Kilburn is a lightweight piece of vintage styled engineering. Setting the bar as one of the loudest speakers in its class, the Kilburn is a compact, stout-hearted hero with a well-balanced audio which boasts a clear midrange and extended highs for a sound that is both articulate and pronounced. The analogue knobs allow you to fine tune the controls to your personal preferences while the guitar-influenced leather strap enables easy and stylish travel.

item.title: Walnut Cutting BoardProduct
item.dc:creator: nguyenluan
item.description:
Product Specs: W4.7″ x L4.1″ Porcelain A classic with a twist. This plate is made dynamic with a simple play on asymmetry. Made in Japan. Simple. Functional. Everlasting. Microwave and dishwasher safe.
  • Made in Japan
  • Microwave and dishwasher safe

item.title: Travel Tumbler in White
item.dc:creator: nguyenluan
item.description:
Product Specs: ø2.9 x H7.8 in / 17 oz Stainless Steel (Powder Coating) Polypropylene, Silicone Note the minimalist aesthetic and clean lines. Keep your drinks hot or cold for 6 hours—courtesy of the vacuum-insulated, double-walled stainless steel. Please do not use in the microwave or dishwasher. Besides, a product this beautiful, it deserves the soft caress of your hands.
  • Keep drinks hot and cold for 6 hours
  • Not microwave and dishwasher safe
  • BPA-free

item.title: The heart of Bembien

item.description: Product Specs: W1.2″ x L6.3″ Brass For special occasions… or daily. Eat like royalty, whenever you feel like it. Because why not?

item.description:

  • Made in Japan
  • Microwave and dishwasher safe

item.title: Peach Wood Chopsticks
item.dc:creator: nguyenluan
item.description:
Product Specs: L9″ Peach Wood Made from peach wood. These chopsticks have a lovely texture. Dipped in 100% beeswax to finish.
  • Made in Japan
  • Made in wood from fruit trees
  • Finished with 100% pure beeswax

  • Made in Japan
